flavor: I go wherever I please, whenever I please.
info: Whenever you lose a round, return this unit from the battlefield to your hand.
name: Ciri

flavor: Magic is Chaos, Art and Science. It is a curse, a blessing and a progression.
info:
Deploy (Melee): Damage all other units by 2. 
Deploy (Ranged): Boost all other units by 2.
name: Yennefer of Vengerberg

flavor: A patriot… and a real pain in the rear.
info:
Spying.
Deploy: Play the top 2 cards from your deck.
name: Vernon Roche

flavor: Really believe you can dupe me with that tale you just pulled from your arse?
info:
Order: Gain 1 Coin. Charge: 5
Whenever you play a Crime card, gain 1 Coin.
name: Sigismund Dijkstra

flavor: Paintings should convey emotion, not words.
info: Ranged: Whenever you play a unit with Deathwish, trigger its Deathwish ability.
name: Ge'els
